xwikidoc.title: Piwik Translation File
xwikidoc.content: admin.piwik=Matomo admin.piwik.notrunning=Matomo tracking is not running. Please fill in the "Matomo URL" and the "Site ID". admin.piwik.running=Matomo tracking is running. XWiki.PiwikCode_method=Tracking Method XWiki.PiwikCode_url=Matomo URL XWiki.PiwikCode_siteid=Site ID XWiki.PiwikCode_userTracking=User Tracking XWiki.PiwikCode_multidomain=Multidomain Tracking XWiki.PiwikCode_domain=Domain URL XWiki.PiwikCode_method_image=Image Tracking XWiki.PiwikCode_method_javascript=Javascript Tracking admin.piwik.method.description=Either uses Javascript or an Image to insert the tracking code admin.piwik.url.description=The URL of your tracking code (where matomo.php is located, ex: https://matomo.mydomain.com/) admin.piwik.siteid.description=The site id to use (needed to activate tracking) admin.piwik.userTracking.description=Activate user ID tracking (only compatible with Javascript Tracking) admin.piwik.multidomain.description=Activate Multi-domain tracking (*.mydomain.com) admin.piwik.domain.description=Specify the domain of the multidomain tracking (ex: mydomain.com) admin.piwik.trackingcode=Tracking code that will be included admin.piwik.multiwiki.description=Activate Multi-wiki tracking
